attributes.action: ALLOW GURKHAS WHO HAVE FOUGHT FOR US TO STAY AS UK PEOPLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these brave people who have fought for this country and died should be given the right to become uk citizens as a right, they have done a great deal for this country and this government should respect that with allowing this, if you agree please sign it, thanks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
